317616.「３つの地方の調査は 無事終了っ！\n 星のオーラも たーっぷり 手に入ったし\:
I've successfully completed my research in all three regions, and now that I have plenty of Benevolessence, I wonder if the door to the
Mountain Pass Shrine will open this time.

317617.「この調子で 創失の呪いを解く方法\n 見つけだそうね。<pc>隊長！:
Keep this up and we'll find a way to break the
curse of unmaking. Captain <pc>!

317618.「よう。お前たち もう戻ってたのか。: Hey, guys. You guys are back already?

317620.「やあ 君たち。\n メネト村の調査では 世話になったね。\n ドゥラ院長は 中:
Hey guys, thanks for your help with the Menet
Village survey, is Director Dura in there?

317622.「あーっ エッちゃんと ナブおじさんだ！！: Ahhhh, it's Ekchan and Uncle Nabu!

317624.「ちぇーっ。モフり失敗かぁ……。\n 調査の疲れを プク毛の モフモフで\n い:
Damn... Failed at fluffing... I wanted to heal
my tiredness from the research with a fluffy
puku hair~.

317625.「やれやれ。そんなに ショボくれんなよ。\n ポルテの嬢ちゃんよ。: Oh, dear. Don't be so shabby, Porte's girl.

317627.「な…なんて うらやましい……！\n 私だって あの フカフカの毛並みを\n モ:
How envious I am...! I wanted to fluff up that
fluffy fur, too..!

317628.「……ゴホン。なんでもありません。\n 私たちも ただいま 帰還いたしました。: ...Gohon. It's nothing. We're back home, too.

317629.「なにやら 外が にぎやかだと思えば……\n 皆さん お戻りのようですね。:
If you think there is a lot of activity
outside... it seems everyone is back.

317630.「おや。南の地の調査へ向かった\n メレアーデ王女と ジーガンフ殿は？:
Oh, well. Where are Princess Mereade and Lord
Jiganf headed to investigate the southern
lands?

317632.「ジーくんは アマラークの住民たちに\n フーラズーラとの戦い方を 教えるため\:
Gee is staying behind to teach the residents
of Amarak how to fight Hula Zula.

317633.「では……これで 全員ですね。\n ゼニアス 南 北 東の 調査結果を\n お聞:
So...that's all of you...now let's hear your
findings for Zeniath South, North, and East.

317634.<pc>たち 調査隊員は\n果ての大地ゼニアス ３地方の調査結果を\nドゥラ院長:
<pc> and others The survey team
reported their findings to Director Dura in
the three Zeniath regions!

317635.「ふむ……。ゼニアス各地の住人たちは\n それぞれに 問題を抱えていたようですね:
Hmmm...it seems that the inhabitants of all
parts of Zeniath had their own problems.

317636.「そして 女神ゼネシアが 言うとおり\n 人々を助けると その星封の結晶に\n:
And when the Goddess Zenethia helped people as
she said, the Benevogem was imbued with
Benevolessence...

317637.「うん！ 町の人たちを 助けると\n <pc>隊長が持つ 星封の結晶が\n 青く:
Yes, I did! Captain <pc>'s Benevogem
glowed blue as he helped the people of the
town.

317638.「すごく あったかくて きれいだったよ。\n 星のオーラって みんなの感謝の心か:
Benevolessence is born out of everyone's
gratitude, isn't it?

317639.「少なくとも <pc>と ポルテが会った\n 例の 女神ゼネシアってヤツは\n:
At least the Goddess Zenethia whom
<pc> and Porte met with is not
lying.

317641.「ラキ！ どうして この場所に……？: Raki! How did you get to this place...?

317642.「ラキは 見ていた。\n おまえたちが 星のオーラを 手に入れるのを。:
Raki was watching. Raki was watching you get
Benevolessence.

317643.「……峠のほこらへ 来るといい。\n ゼネシアねえさまが\n おまえたちを 待っ:
Come to the Mountain Pass Shrine. Lady
Zenethia is waiting for you.

317644.「待って ラキ！\n 峠のほこらへ行くなら 私たちと一緒に……:
If you want to go to Mountain Pass Shrine,
come with us...

317645.「ゼニアス西部の 調査担当は <pc>と\n ポルテの嬢ちゃんだったはずだが\n:
I thought and Porte's daughter were in charge of the investigation in western Zeniath, but it seems that Princess Mereade is
also participating.

317646.「……そのようですね。\n <pc>隊長。ふたりのことを 頼みます。:
...it seems that way. Captain <pc>.
I'm asking you to take care of the two of
them.

317647.「まあ <pc>が ついてりゃ\n 心配はないと思うが\n しっかりやれよ ポル:
Well, with <pc> on your side, I
don't think you have anything to worry about.

317648.「西部は 禁足地とのこと……。\n 何が 待ち受けているか わかりません。\n:
The western part of the country is a no-go
zone... You never know what might be waiting
for you. Please be careful.

317649.「何かあったら すぐに 知らせてくれ。\n 僕たちが チカラになるよ。:
If you need anything, let us know right away.
We'll be there for you.

317651.「おっかしいな～？\n なんで 開かないんだろ……。: Oops~? I wonder why it won't open...

317652.「……無駄だ。\n その扉は チカラでは 開かない。:
It's useless. That door cannot be opened by
force.

317653.「むむむ～っ！\n じゃあ 開け方 教えてってばー！: Mmmm~! Then tell me how to open it!

317656.「ふふっ。遠方より来たりし 客人と\n すっかり 仲良くなったのですね……。\n:
Hmmm. I see that you have come from far away
and have become friends with your guests... I
am also very happy for you.

317657.「前から 不思議な子だとは 思ってたけど\n 女神さまの 弟だったなんて……！:
I always thought she was a mysterious girl,
but to think that she was the brother of a
goddess...!

317658.「ねえさま。この者たちは\n 星のオーラを 手に入れてくれました。\n ……今な:
Hey, sir. These guys got Benevolessence.
...now, I'm sure!

317659.「ええ……。必ずや 成しとげてくださると\n 信じていました <pc>……。:
Yes... I was sure you would make it
<pc>...

317660.「彼方なる世界より 来たりし 誓約の子らよ。\n どうか そのチカラを お貸しく:
From the world beyond, you children of the
covenant. Please lend us your power.

317661.「ねえさまを 封印から解き放ってほしい。\n ……おまえたちにしか できないこと:
I want you to free her from the seal. Only you
can do that.

317663.「今 あなたがたと 言葉を交わしている\n この姿は かりそめのもの……。:
The image that I am exchanging words with you
now is a call...

317664.「本当のわたくしは この扉の向こう……\n 禁足地と 呼ばれる地にて\n 長き眠:
The real me is behind this door in a long
sleep in a place called the Forbidden Land.

317665.「ええっと～。\n 前に ゼネシアさまが言ってた\n いにしえの戦い…ってやつの:
Let's see... Is it because of the ancient
battle that Zenethia-sama mentioned before?

317666.「……まこと 恐ろしき災いでした。\n 我が父も あの戦いで……。:
It was a terrible disaster. My father was in
that battle.

317667.「神なき世界が いかなる有様になるかは\n ゼニアスを旅した あなたがたが\n:
You have seen what a godless world looks like
as you have traveled through Zeniath.

317668.「誓約の子らの もたらす 光にて\n 目覚めることができた 今こそ\n わたくし:
Now that I have been awakened by the light of
the children of the covenant, I want to save
this world.

317669.「さあ <pc>……。\n あなたがたに授けた\n 星封の結晶を この扉へ……。:
Come <pc>... I give you the Benevogem
to this door...

317670.「ほらほら <pc>隊長！\n 星封の結晶だよっ！:
Look, look, Captain <pc>, it's a
Benevogem!

317671.「ああ……懐かしき 星のオーラの輝き。\n どれほど この時を 待ちわびたことか:
Ah...the nostalgic glow of Benevolessence. How
long I have waited for this moment...

317672.「……時は 来たれり！\n 扉に 星封の結晶を かざし\n ゼニアスに 光を も:
The time has come! Hold the Benevogem over the
door and bring light to Zeniath...!

317675.「なんて 神々しい……。\n あの方が この世界の女神 ゼネシア様なのね。:
How divine... She must be the goddess of this
world, Zenethia.

317676.「ねえ ラキ。\n 大樹の鳥籠まで 道案内を 頼めないかしら？:
Hey Raki, can you give me directions to Big
Tree Birdcage?

317677.「むりだ。封印の地 大樹の鳥籠には\n 絶対に 近づくなと ラキは\n とうさま:
It's impossible. Raki is under strict orders
from the Lord to stay away from the sealed Big
Tree Birdcage.

317680.「とにかく 次の目標は\n その 大樹の鳥籠という場所のようね。\n まずは 扉:
Anyway, it looks like our next target is this
place called Big Tree Birdcage. Let's go
through the door first.

317681.「……木は 生えてるけど\n 大樹の鳥籠って カンジじゃないねー。\n ここじゃ:
...There are trees, but Big Tree Birdcage is
not a cange. Maybe it's not here?

317682.「人が 住んでいた形跡は あるけれど……: There are signs of human habitation, but...

317683.「いたいたっ！\n <pc>隊長 あの子たちに\n 道を 聞いてみようよ！:
I wanted to be there! Captain <pc>,
let's ask those kids for directions!

317685.「おいで……。一緒に 遊ぼ？: Come here... Come play with me?

317690.「えっ……！\n 誰なの アンタたち……。\n まさか……町の外から 来たの？:
Eh...! Who are you people...? Don't tell me...
you came from out of town?

317691.「わあっ。星封の結晶が 光ったよ！\n 女神さまの お導きだねっ。\n <pc>:
The Benevogem is shining! It's the goddess's
guidance, isn't it? Captain <pc>!

317692.「ええ。この門の 向こうに\n 大樹の鳥籠があるに 違いないわ。\n さっそく:
Yes. Big Tree Birdcage must be just beyond
this gate. Let's get going!

317694.「町の外に出ちゃ 危ないよ。\n あの オオカミが どこかで 見張ってる。\n:
You shouldn't go out of town. That wolf is
watching us from somewhere. If you go outside,
you might get attacked!

317695.「この町に 子供は アタシたちだけ。\n お父さんと お母さん おじいちゃんと\:
We're the only children in this town. Father,
mother, grandfather, and I are trapped in an
empty town.

317696.「だから アタシたち ずっと\n 古い物語の本に出てくる 外の世界に\n あこが:
That's why we've always longed for the outside
world of old storybooks...

317697.「お願い！ ずっと この町にいて！\n 町の中にいれば オオカミは 襲ってこない:
Please! Stay in this town! The wolf won't
attack if we stay in town. Tell us about the
outside world!

317698.「<pc>隊長ォ～ メレち～。\n この子たち どうしよっか……。:
Captain <pc> O~ Merechi~! What should
we do with these kids...?

317699.「……ごめんなさい ふたりとも。\n 私たち とても 大事な用があるから\n ど:
I'm sorry, both of us. We have to leave
because we have something very important to
do.

317700.「でも 心配はいらないわ。\n <pc>は 世界中の誰よりも強くて\n 頼りにな:
But don't worry. <pc> is stronger
and more dependable than anyone else in the
world. Even wolves don't bother him!

317701.「じゃあ……メレちー。\n アタシも 連れてってくれる？:
Well then...Melechi. Will you take me with
you?

317702.「ダメだよ デニッサ！\n おじいちゃん 足が悪いから アタシたちが\n マキを:
No, Denissa! Grandpa's lame, so we have to
break the maki and carry the food!

317703.「……それに お母さんも お父さんも\n さみしがり屋だよ。アンタがいなくなった:
Besides, your mother and father are both
lonely...they'll miss you and cry every day
when you're gone...

317704.「……そうだよね。ごめんね ロイザ。\n アタシ いかない。\n メレちー。また:
I'm sorry, Loiza. Sorry Loiza, I'm not going.
Melechi. Come see me again...

317705.「いいのよ 気にしないで。\n 約束するわ。大事な用事が 終わったら\n 必ず:
It's okay. Don't worry about it. I promise. I
promise you that I will come back to this town
when I'm done with my important work.

317707.メレアーデは デニッサから\n守護天使のお守りを もらった！:
Mereade received a Guardian Angel Amulet from
Denissa!

317708.「きれいな細工ね……。\n あなたの 宝物じゃないの？: Beautifully crafted... Isn't it your treasure?

317709.「すごーく昔に おじいちゃんが くれたの。\n 町の 守護天使さまのチカラが宿っ:
My grandfather gave it to me a long time ago.
It's a charm with the power of the town's
protection angel.

317710.「聖なるチカラで 悪いヤツから\n 守ってくれるんだって。\n あの オオカミに:
They say it has a holy power to protect us
from bad guys. It might even work on that
wolf!

317711.「……ありがとう！\n それじゃ 少しの間だけ貸してもらうわね。\n 絶対 無事:
Thank you! Well then, I'll let you borrow it
for a little while. I'll come back safely and
return it to you.

317712.「へへっ。ほんと メレちーって\n いいお姉ちゃんって カンジだよね～。:
Hehe. Merechi is really a good big sister,
isn't she?

317713.「……ええ そうかもね。\n さあ 出発しましょう <pc>。\n 北にあるとい:
...yeah, maybe. Let's get going
<pc>. We are going to Big Tree
Birdcage, which is located in the north!

317716.<center>……誓約の子らよ……。\nどう…か……\nわたくしを ここ…から:
Children of the covenant... Please... take...
me... from... here... to... here..!

317717.「ずいぶん 苦しそう……。\n 早く 封印から 解き放ってあげなきゃ。:
He seems to be in a lot of pain... I have to
free him from the seal soon.

317718.「むむむむぅ～。でも あんな高いとこじゃ\n どうしようもないよ……。:
Mmmmmm~. But there's nothing I can do from
that high up...

317719.「ヒ ヒヒヒ……。\n 悪いんだぁ 悪いんだぁ……。\n ここは ヒミツの 場所:
Baboon... I'm sorry, I'm sorry... This is a
secret place.

317720.「だぁれも 来ちゃ いけない場所に\n こぉーっそり 忍びこむ 悪い子には……:
I'll sneak in where no one's supposed to come
from...

317723.「……なぁーんだぁ オマエたち\n 誓約の子…だったのかぁ……。:
Oh, my God, you are the children of the
pledge...

317725.「誓約の子……だっけ？\n 女神さまにも そう 呼ばれたけど\n どういう意味な:
The child of the covenant... right? That's
what the Goddess called me, but what does it
mean?

317726.<center>ああ <cs_pchero>……！\n幻では ないのですね。\n:
Oh <cs_pchero>..! It's not an illusion, is
it? At last you are here.

317727.<center>こんなにも 晴れやかな気持ちに なれたのは\n久方ぶりです……。:
It's been a long time since I have felt so
fine...

317728.<center>さあ 星封の結晶を……。\n星のオーラを ささげてくださいませ…:
Please give us your Benevogem and
Benevolessence!

317729.<cs_pchero>は 星封の結晶に集めた\n星のオーラを ささげた！:
<cs_pchero> gave the Benevolessence
collected in the Benevogem!

317730.「……何万年もの間\n この時を 待ちわびていました。:
...I have been waiting for this moment for
tens of thousands of years.

317731.「わたくしを 解き放ってくださったこと……\n 心より 感謝します <cs_pc:
I thank you from the bottom of my heart for
untying me <cs_pchero>...

317733.「ありがとう 優しい方。\n あなたは……。おふたりの 仲間でしたね？:
Thank you, kind one. You were... You were a
companion for both of us, weren't you?

317734.「あっ この人は メレちーです！\n あたしと <cs_pchero>隊長と 一:
Oh, this is Merechi! She's a princess who's on
the survey team with me and Captain
<cs_pchero>.

317735.「まあ……！ メレちー……ですか？\n 少々 風変わりですが\n とっても素敵な:
Well...! Melechi...? A little eccentric, but a
very nice name, isn't it?

317736.「そのっ 今のは ポルテちゃんが つけてくれた\n 私の愛称で……！\n 本当の:
I mean, that's my nickname that Porte-chan
gave me...! My real name is Mereade.

317740.「かわいらしい お名前を ありがとう。\n ……ポルテ。: Thank you for your lovely name. ...Porte.

317741.「さすが 女神様は 心が広いわね……。:
As expected of a goddess, she has a big
heart...

317742.「さあ ゼニアスに生きる すべての者のため\n この鳥籠を 後にしましょう……:
Now, for the sake of all those who live in
Zeniath, let us leave this birdcage...

317744.「……あら？\n 私たち 部屋の中に いたはずなのに。: Oh, no. We were supposed to be in the room.

317745.「バビューン！ って飛ぶの 気持ちいい～！\n ありがとう ネーしゃまっ！:
Babyung! It feels so good to fly! Thank you,
Neshama!

317746.「大地に満ちる この気配……\n 数万年の眠りを経ても 世界を蝕む呪いは\n い:
This presence that fills the earth... Even after tens of thousands of years of slumber, the curse that has been consuming the world
has not yet disappeared...

317747.「ゼネシア様！\n その 呪いというのは もしかして……！:
Lady Zenethia! Could that curse possibly
be...?

317748.「あなたがたの世界に 広まりつつある\n かの 災いの源こそが\n 果ての大地ゼ:
The source of the plague that is spreading
throughout your world is the terrible curse
that is consuming Zeniath.

317749.「……創失の呪いが 消えぬかぎり\n ゼニアスも あなたがたの世界も\n 決して:
As long as the curse of unmaking remains
unremoved, neither Zeniath nor your world will
ever be saved...

317750.「これは 誓約の子である あなたがたにしか\n できぬこと。ゼニアスに満ちる 創:
This can only be done by you, the children of
the covenant, to cut off the source of the
curse of unmaking that fills Zeniath...!

317751.「聖湖ゼニートより 川沿いに さかのぼり\n 西の ウォルドの聖簾を 目指すので:
From Sacred Lake Zenito, we will follow the
river upstream to Wold in the west.

317752.「ネーしゃま！\n どこ 行っちゃうの～！？: Hey, Nee-sha! Where are you going~!

317753.「ゼニアスを 守護する神として\n 長き眠りの果てに この世界が いかなる姿と\:
As the protective deity of Zeniath, we must
determine what the world has become after its
long sleep.

317754.「我が民と 大地の 現状を確かめたなら\n すぐに わたくしも\n ウォルドの聖:
As soon as I see what is happening to my
people and the land, I too will head for the
Wold.

317756.「ウォルドの聖簾って 遠いのかなー。\n もう あたし へとへとだよ～。:
I wonder if Wold is far away. I'm exhausted
already!

317757.「<cs_pchero>隊長！\n 今日は 疲れたから 聖湖ゼニートで休んで\n:
Captain <cs_pchero>! I'm tired today, let's
rest at Sacred Lake Zenito and leave tomorrow!

317758.「そういえば デニッサと ロイザに\n 外の世界の話を してあげる約束だったわね:
Oh, by the way, you promised to tell Denissa
and Loiza about the outside world.

317759.「みんな！ お腹すいたでしょ。\n ごちそう 作ってきてあげたよっ！:
Hey, guys! You must be hungry. I made you a
feast!

317760.「わぁっ おいしそう……！\n 私たちのために ありがとう。ロイザ！:
Wow, looks delicious..! Thank you Loiza, for
all you did for us!

317761.「ねえ もうひとりの子は どうしたの？\n ほらほら 妹の……\n たしか デニ:
Hey, what happened to the other girl? Oh,
look, look, my sister... a girl named Denissa,
I think.

317763.「アタシは ひとりっ子だよ。\n デニッサなんて人 知らない。:
I am an only child and I don't know anyone
named Denissa.

317764.「そうよ ポルテちゃん。冗談はやめて。\n この町にいる 子どもは ロイザだけじ:
Yes, Porte-chan. You've got to be kidding me.
Loiza is not the only child in town.

317765.「あ あはははは！ そうだったよね。\n ……ところで あたしたちが 出発してか:
Ah-ha-ha! That's right. By the way, has
anything changed since we left?

317766.「えっとね。みんなのことが 気になって\n 北の門に行ったんだ。そしたら あのオ:
Well, let's see. I went to the north gate because I was worried about everyone. Then that wolf appeared in front of me... and I was
so scared that I fainted.

317767.「しばらくして 目が覚めたら\n オオカミは いなくなってたんだけど\n ほんっ:
When I woke up a while later, the wolf was
gone, but it was really a close call.

317768.「ごめんごめん！ 食事が 冷めちゃうよね。\n 町の外の話は あとで聞かせて。\:
Sorry, sorry! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! We'll talk
about out of town later. Please, enjoy your
meal.

317769.「……つまり このお守りを くれた子が\n 大樹の鳥籠から 戻ってくるまでの間に:
...you mean that the child who gave you this
amulet was unmaking it before he came back
from the Big Tree Birdcage...

317770.「うん。ロイザと デニッサは 双子の女の子。\n 最初に 町に着いたとき メレち:
Yes, Loiza and Denissa are twins. When they
first got to town, Melechi protected Denissa
from the wolves.

317771.「わからない……。\n 私の記憶に そんな女の子は いないの。\n でも あなた:
I don't know... I don't remember any girl like
that. But I don't think you guys are lying.

317772.「……ごめんなさい デニッサ。\n あなたのこと 忘れてしまって……。: I'm sorry Denissa, I forgot about you...

317773.「それにしても 不思議ね……。\n どうして <pc>と ポルテちゃんだけが\n:
I still wonder... How come only <pc>
and Porte-chan can remember who they unmaking?

317774.「う～ん……。なんでだろうね？\n メレちーや ロイザのほうが\n デニッサとは:
Hmmm... I wonder why? Melechi and Loiza must
have been closer to Denissa.

317775.「なんにせよ 例の狼が\n 創失の呪いに 関わっている可能性が高そうね。:
In any case, it seems very likely that the
wolf is involved in the unmaking curse.

317776.「でもさ メレちー。\n あんなヤツ アストルティアに いなかったよ？\n 同じ:
But you know what, Melechi? He wasn't in
Astoltia, was he? If it's the same curse,
shouldn't the source be the same too?

317777.「……確かに そうよね。\n はぁ～っ！ わからないことだらけで\n 頭が 痛く:
...Sure, you're right. Sigh~! My head is
starting to hurt from all the things I don't
understand!

317778.「とにかく 明日は ネーしゃまが言ってた\n ウォルドの聖簾ってとこに 行ってみ:
Anyway, tomorrow I'll go to Wold, the place
Nay-sama mentioned! Then the source of the
curse will be clear.

317780.「よぉーっし！ 腹が減っては いくさはできぬ！\n ……って 言うもんね。\n:
Good heavens! You can't do something if you're
hungry! That's what they say. I'm going to eat
a lot tonight and get a good night's rest!

317781.「明日も がんばろうねっ。\n <pc>隊長 メレちー！:
Let's do our best tomorrow, too.
Captain <pc> Melechi!

317782.<pc> ポルテ メレアーデは\nロイザ手作りの夕食を たいらげ\nゆっくり 眠:
<pc> Porte Mereade ate Loiza's home-
made dinner and slowly fell asleep...

317784.「すっごく キレイな滝だね～。\n ネーしゃまの話だと\n ここに 呪いの源が:
It's a very beautiful waterfall, isn't it?
According to Nay-sama, there is a source of
the curse here...

317785.「ウォルドの聖簾は 聖なる地……。\n 立ち入ることは ゆるさない。:
Wold is a holy place. Wold is a sacred
place... that you are not allowed to enter.

317786.「……去れ。\n 二度と この滝に 近づくな。:
...leave. Never come near this waterfall
again.

317787.「ラキ……？\n どうしたの そんなに怖い顔をして……。: Raki...? What's wrong, you look so scared...

317788.「ラキは ふつうだ。\n ……早く 立ち去るといい。:
Raki is normal. ...you'd better get out of
here.

317789.「女神ゼネシア様は 呪いの源が\n ここにあると 言っていたわ。\n 呪いを断た:
Goddess Zenethia said that the source of the
curse is here. If the curse is not broken, the
world will not be saved.

317790.「ラキ。あなたは アマラークの民を\n 助けようとしていた……。\n ゼニアスを:
Raki, you were trying to help the people of
Amarak...you love Zeniath, don't you?

317791.「どんな事情があるかは 知らないけれど\n お願い……どうか 邪魔をしないで。\:
I don't know what your reasons are, but
please... please don't let them get in the
way. We want to save the world!

317792.「たとえ ねえさまの 言いつけでも\n ……ここだけは 絶対に だめだ！:
Even if it's on Nanny's advice... definitely
not in here!

317794.「……しかたない。\n ラキは 役目を 果たすだけ！: Raki is just doing his job!

317796.「……これ以上 乱暴はしたくないの。\n ラキ お願いよ。ここを通して。:
I don't want to be rough any more, Raki,
please. Let me through here.

317797.「ラキは……\n 命にかえても 役目を 果たす！:
Raki... does his part, even if it costs him
his life!

317798.「ひゃっ！？\n あの子 まだ やる気だよ～！: What? She's still going for it~!

317801.「<cs_pchero>たちは わたくしを\n 封印から 解き放ってくれた 恩人:
<cs_pchero> and the others are the
benefactors who freed me from the seal... I
will not allow you to hurt them.

317802.「でも！ ラキは とうさまを 守る！\n とうさまの 言いつけだ！:
But! Raki protects his father! At your
father's bidding!

317803.「……ラキ。あなたは 父の守護者であると同時に\n 果ての大地ゼニアスの 守護者:
You are the protector of Zeniath as well as
the protector of the Father. You must not lose
sight of what is important.

317804.「創失の呪いは 悪しき者どもを 退けた！\n もう 何万年か 待っていれば\n:
The curse of unmaking has driven out the wicked! Wait a few more tens of thousands of years and the curse will fade away and Zeniath
will be at peace!

317805.「その間 数え切れぬほどの命が\n 創失の呪いにより 失われていくのを\n あな:
In the meantime, countless lives will be lost
due to the curse of unmaking, and you are just
going to stand by and let it happen!

317806.「……長き まどろみの中で わたくしは\n はかなき望みを 抱いておりました。:
In my long slumber, I have held out to you a
faint hope.

317807.「永劫にも思える まどろみの間に 創失の呪いは\n この地より 消え果てるはず…:
In a seemingly eternal slumber, the curse of
unmaking will vanish from this land, just as
my father promised me before he fell asleep.

317808.「けれど 父の願いも むなしく\n 創失の呪いは いまだ消えず……\n 異世界ア:
However, despite his father's wishes, the curse of unmaking has not disappeared... and it has even spread to the other world of
Astoltia.

317809.「ラキ。もはや 我々だけの問題ではないのです。\n ゼニアスと アストルティア。:
Raki, it is no longer our problem alone, for
the two worlds of Zeniath and Astoltia, we
must cut off the source of the curse...

317810.「ラキは ゆるさない！！\n みんなみんな この地より 去れっ！:
Raki will not be forgiven! Everyone leave this
land!

317813.「しばらく そこで\n 頭を 冷やしていなさい……！: Keep your head down there for a while..!

317815.「……心配は いりません。\n あの子が 落ち着いたら\n すぐに 出してあげま:
Don't worry. I'll get you out of here as soon
as she calms down... so...

317816.「ネーしゃま！ また 透き通ってるよ！？: Nay Shama! It's crystal clear again!

317818.「滝の中に 扉が……！？: There's a door in the waterfall...!

317821.「この場所に 創失の呪いの源が……？\n 奥へ進んでみましょう <cs_pche:
This place is the source of the curse of
unmaking...? Let's go deeper <cs_pchero>.

317822.「ども。お邪魔してまーす……。: Hi there. Sorry to bother you...

317823.「それにしても 不気味な部屋ね……。\n 創失の呪いの源は どこなのかしら？:
Still, it's a creepy room...I wonder where the
curse of unmaking comes from?

317825.「なんて巨大な 人間……なの？\n ……それに この霧は。: What a huge human...? ...and this fog.

317827.「消えちゃった！？\n ねえ……。創失の呪いの源って……:
It's gone! Hey...the source of the curse of
unmaking...

317828.「あいつっ！\n 聖湖ゼニートに現れた 狼だよ！:
That's the wolf that showed up at Sacred Lake
Zenito!

317829.「主の眠りを さまたげることは\n 絶対に ゆるさない……！:
I will not allow anything to disturb the sleep
of the Lord..!

317831.「話はあとよ <cs_pchero>！\n 今は あの狼を 止めましょう！:
We'll talk later <cs_pchero>! Now let's
stop that wolf!

317832.「やっぱり あなただったのね。\n ラキ……どうして こんなことを？:
I knew it was you, Raki...how could you do
this?

317833.「とうさまの 眠りを さまたげる者は\n ゆるさない……！\n おまえたちには:
I will not allow anyone to disturb the sleep
of the Lord..! I will not let you touch me!

317834.「ラキは……とうさまを 守る。\n たとえ この命に かえてもっ……！:
Raki... will protect you. Even if it costs me
my life..!

317836.「私は あの男の子を 助けなきゃ……。\n でも……あの子の名前が 思いだせない:
I have to save that boy. But...I can't
remember his name. That boy... who's that boy?

317838.「あ…あれは……\n あの子は ラキよ！\n どうして……私 忘れていたのっ！？:
Oh...that...that girl is Raki! How did I
forget?

317839.「神なる身をもってしても 逃れられぬ呪いは\n 今なお お父様の身体より わきい:
A curse from which no deity can escape still
rises from your father's body and threatens to
destroy the world.

317840.「……自分ひとり 残して\n 世界のすべてが消え去ることを\n どうして お父様:
Why would your father want the whole world to
disappear, leaving you alone?

317841.「誓約の子たる あなたがたならば\n 呪いの源を 断つことも できるやもと\n:
I led you here under the impression that you,
as children of the covenant, could break the
curse at its source...

317842.「創失の呪いの前には ラキすら この有様。\n 人たる身に 太刀打ちできるはずも:
Before the curse of unmaking, even Raki is like this. There is no way that I, as a human being, can compete. ...I guess we have to find
another way.

317843.「待って ラキ！\n まだ 無理をしちゃ ダメよ！！: Wait, Raki! Don't overdo it yet!

317844.「あの子が ご迷惑を おかけしましたね……。\n ラキは 世界の創造主たる 我が:
Raki is the divine beast of my father, the
creator of the world.

317845.「主に 忠義を尽くすあまり\n その言いつけを 絶対と 思い込んでいるだけで\n:
He is not a bad boy because he is so loyal to
the Lord that he thinks his word is
absolute...

317846.「……この 地底に眠る巨人こそが\n 創失の呪いの源……\n そして 我らが父な:
...This giant sleeping in the depths of the
earth is the source of the curse of unmaking
and our father god, Gran Zenith.

317847.「我が父の生みだせし 創失の呪いこそが\n ゼニアスと アストルティアを蝕む\n:
The curse of unmaking that my father has
created is the source of all that is eating
away at Zeniath and Astoltia...

317848.「父は この地底に 自らを封じ込めることで\n 何万年もかけて 呪いを 鎮めよう:
My father tried for tens of thousands of years to appease the curse by sealing himself in this subterranean depths...unsuccessfully, it
seems.

317849.「あ あの……！ 今の神様の名前って\n アストルティアの 人間の神と 同じでは:
Oh, um..! Isn't the name of the current god
the same as the human god in Astoltia?

317850.「あなたがたの世界のことは 存じませんが\n この世界 ゼニアスにおける\n グ:
I don't know about your world, but in this
world of Zeniath, Gran Zenith is the creator
of all things.

317851.「我が父にして 我ら すべての父\n 一なる神 主神グランゼニスによって\n ゼ:
Zeniath was created by God Gran Zenith, our
Father, the Father of us all.

317852.「……そして わたくし ゼネシアと\n 妹のルティアナは\n 主神グランゼニスの:
And I, Zenethia, and my sister Lutiana are
goddesses, daughters of God Gran Zenith...

317853.「女神…ルティアナ……！？\n それって しばらく前に 亡くなられた\n アスト:
Goddess Lutiana...! That must be the creator
of Astoltia, who passed away a while ago!

317855.「そう…ですか……。\n わたくしが 長き眠りについている間に\n ……妹は も:
I see... While I was in a long sleep... my
sister was already...

317856.「気が遠くなるほど 昔……: It's been so long that I'm losing my mind...

317857.「果ての大地ゼニアスを\n ジア・クト念晶体という\n 恐ろしい生命体が 襲いま:
Zeniath was attacked by a terrifying life form
called Dia Kut telecrystal...

317858.「激しい戦いの末 敗北を予感した お父様は\n か弱き妹 ルティアナと この世界:
After a fierce battle, your father, sensing
defeat, let his frail sister Lutiana and the
creatures of this world escape from Zeniath.

317859.「ルティアナを 送り出した後\n わたくしは 父を助け ジア・クトと\n 戦いま:
After sending Lutiana away, I helped my father
fight Dia Kut, but I was defeated beyond my
strength.

317860.「父は ジア・クトから わたくしを守るため\n この身を 大樹の鳥籠に封じ\n:
My father had to seal himself in the Big Tree
Birdcage to protect me from Dia Kut, so he
chose the last resort.

317861.「それこそが 創失の呪い……！: That is the curse of unmaking...!

317862.「呪いに触れたもの すべてを消し去る\n 諸刃のつるぎを振るい 父グランゼニスは:
Wielding a double-edged sword that obliterates
all those touched by its curse, Father Gran
Zenith sought to destroy Dia Kut...

317863.「ふたつの世界を蝕む 創失の呪いは\n かつて この世界を守らんがため\n 放た:
The curse of unmaking that consumes the two
worlds was once unleashed to protect this
world.

317864.「……ジア・クト念晶体は\n 創失の呪いに侵され 逃げ去りましたが\n 呪いは:
...Dia Kut telecrystal was affected by the curse of unmaking and fled, but the curse consumed my father's body and did not
disappear...

317865.「そのため お父様は この地下神殿深くに\n 己が身を封じ 時が呪いを消し去ると:
Therefore, your father sealed himself deep in this subterranean temple and went into a long sleep, believing that time would erase the
curse.

317866.「されど 数万年の時を経ても 呪いは消え去らず\n ……それどころか 逃げ延びた:
Yet, after tens of thousands of years, the curse has not disappeared... in fact, Dia Kut has escaped, bringing the curse of unmaking to
Astoltia.

317867.「……父は わたくしに こう言いました。\n 妹 ルティアナが帰還せしとき いま:
My father told me, "When your sister Lutiana returns, if the curse is not gone, you must break it yourself. When my sister Lutiana
returns, if the curse has not yet been lifted, I must break it off with my own body.

317868.「ですが 遠き地にて ルティアナは息絶え\n わたくし ひとりでは 呪いに立ち向:
But in a faraway land, Lutiana is dead, and I
cannot face the curse alone. I no longer have
the means to strike...

317871.「お父様！ お父様っ！？\n わたくしです……ゼネシアは 目覚めました！\n ど:
Father! Father! It's me, Zenethia, she's
awake! Please, say the word once more!

317873.「父は とうに 呪いに飲み込まれ\n 助けることはできぬと あきらめていましたが:
My father had given up hope of being able to help them, having been swallowed up by the curse, but he recognized the children of the
covenant and thus called out to them.

317875.「あなたがたと 目覚めし父が 邂逅を果たせば\n 光明が もたらされるかもしれま:
If you and the Awakened Father have a chance
encounter, it may bring a ray of light. I
would like to bet on that.

317876.「誓約の子 <cs_pchero>……。\n いえ ルティアナの子らよ。\n ど:
Children of the covenant <cs_pchero>... No,
children of Lutiana. Please, for the sake of
Zeniath, give me your power...

317877.「いけない……！\n この神殿は 創失の呪いが 最も強い場所。\n いったん 外:
You can't...! This temple is the place where
the curse of unmaking is strongest. Let's go
outside for a while.

317878.「……お父様が眠る 祭壇の間の扉は\n 閉ざしておきました。\n これ以上 創失:
...I have closed the door to the Altar Room
where your father sleeps. So that the curse of
unmaking will not leak out any more.

317879.「ここ ウォルドの聖簾も 聖湖ゼニートも\n わたくしが 眠りにつく前は\n 多:
Wold and Sacred Lake Zenito were both thriving
places full of people before I fell asleep...

317880.「ラキが 創失の呪いから 人々を守るため\n チカラを ふるっていてくれたようで:
It seems that Raki was doing his best to
protect people from the curse of unmaking...
but still, many lives were lost.

317881.「これ以上 ひとりの命とて 失いたくない。\n それが わたくしの願いです……。:
I don't want to lose even one more life. That
is my wish.

317882.「ラキの気配は 神殿内には ありません。\n ……どこか 遠い場所で\n 身を休:
There is no sign of Raki in the temple. ...He
is probably resting somewhere far away.

317883.「ゼニアスの民を 助けてくださったこと……\n そして わたくしに 新たな希望を:
Thank you for helping the people of Zeniath
and giving me new hope.

317884.「父と わたくしは 長き眠りの中で\n ふたたび この世界に 妹ルティアナの子ら:
My father and I lay in a long sleep, waiting
for the day when our sister Lutiana's children
would return to this world again.

317885.「……ゆえに この世界ゼニアスは\n とこしえのゆりかご という二つ名で\n 呼:
...Hence the world Zeniath is called by two
names: Eternal Cradle.

317886.「か弱き妹が 成長し その子らとともに\n 帰還する頃には 創失の呪いや\n ジ:
By the time my fragile sister grows up and returns with her children, we will not have to worry about the curse of unmaking or attacks
by Dia Kut...

317887.「……父たる主神 グランゼニスは\n そう 考えていたようですが\n まさか ル:
...The father, Gran Zenith, seemed to think
so, but he did not expect that Lutiana had
already done so...

317888.「……ええ 感じます。\n あなたがたは 確かに ルティアナの子ら。:
Yes, I feel it. Ye are indeed the children of
Lutiana.

317891.「そして あの子の 愛らしさは\n ルティアナが創り出したる 新しき命……\n:
And her loveliness, the new life that Lutiana
has created, is clearly in you.

317892.「わたくしは ふたつの世界と\n 愛する父とを 救わねばなりません。:
I must save the two worlds and my beloved
father.

317893.「……それこそが 死せる ルティアナが\n あなたがた 誓約の子らに 託した\n:
...for that should be the last wish of Lutiana
the mortal to you, the children of the
covenant.

317894.「今は まだ 封印から解き放たれたばかりで\n チカラも戻りきらぬ わたくしです:
I have only just been freed from the seal and
my strength has not yet returned, but I will
surely find a way to awaken my father.

317895.「その時は どうか\n わたくしに 手を貸してくださいませ。\n ……<cs_p:
If you do, please lend me a hand.
...<cs_pchero>.<yesno><close>

317897.「ええ。燈火の調査隊のチカラで\n 主神グランゼニス様を 目覚めさせて\n ふた:
Yes. Let's use the power of the Light
Investigators to awaken God Gran Zenith and
save our two worlds!

317898.「ありがとう……。\n ですが……申し訳…ありません……。\n しばし 休ませて:
Thank you... But...sorry...sorry... Please let
me rest for a while...

317900.「いろんなことが 一度に 起きすぎて\n ……なんだか 夢でも見ていた気分だわ。:
So many things happened all at once, it's like
I was dreaming.

317901.「ネーしゃまが ラキのねえさまな上に\n 女神ルティアナさまの 姉さまだったなん:
I was surprised to know that Nay-sama is not
only Raki's sister but also Goddess Lutiana's
sister! Captain <cs_pchero>!

317902.「しかも！ ゼニアスが あの伝説の！\n とこしえのゆりかご だったなんてね～。:
What's more! Zeniath is the legendary Eternal
Cradle! It's a little different from what
Master told me.

317903.「創失の呪いが ジア・クトから\n 世界を守るためのもの だったこと……\n 呪:
That the curse of unmaking was intended to protect the world from Dia Kut... that the source of the curse was the Creator God of the
world...

317904.「何もかも 今すぐには\n 飲み込めそうに ないけれど……。\n 私たちで でき:
I don't think I can swallow everything right
now, but... We have to do what we can do.

317905.「まずは はじまりの地に戻って\n 調査隊のみんなに 報告しましょう！\n <c:
First, let's go back to Land of Beginnings and
report back to all the survey crews!
<cs_pchero>!

317906.「すべての はじまりたる場所\n ……果ての大地 ゼニアス。:
The place where it all began...Zeniath, the
land of the end.

317907.「いにしえの神々が交わせし 誓約は\n アストルティアに 新たなる種を 蒔く……:
The covenant made by the gods of old will sow
new seeds in Astoltia...

317908.「芽吹くは 花か それとも……: Is it a flower that buds or...

317909.<cs_pchero>たちは\nはじまりの地へ 戻った……。:
<cs_pchero> and the others returned to the
Land of Beginnings...

318124.「……わたくしは 少し 休んでから\n すぐに あなたがたを 追いかけます。:
...I will rest a little, and then I will go
after you immediately.

319050.「あなたにとって大切な場所なのは わかったわ。\n 呪いの源を断つまでだけでいい:
I understand the importance of this place to
you. Just until we can break the curse. Please
help us...

321807.<center>ほこらを抜けた先は 禁足地 ウォルド地方。\nその北にある 大樹:
After passing through the holiest site is the forbidden Wold Region, and to the north of it is the Big Tree Birdcage, where I have been
confined.

321808.<center>星封の結晶が 導いてくれるでしょう。\nあなたがただけが ゼニア:
The Benevogem will guide you. You alone are
the hope of Zeniath... For the land of the
end, for the people of all peoples, please...

321810.<center>ルティアナの子らよ……\nよくぞ ゼニアスへ 帰り来た……。:
Children of Lutiana, welcome back to
Zeniath...

321811.<center>お前たちに……伝えねば ならぬ。\n……誓約を 果たすのだ\nふ:
I must tell you. I must tell you that you must
fulfill your pledge to the two lights of the
world.

322019.<center>とこしえのゆりかごで 生まれた厄災は\nやがて この世界にも手を:
The evil born in the Eternal Cradle will
eventually reach out to this world. It will
wipe out everything in its path.

322020.<center>お父様…目覚めさせる方法……つきとめたら\n……すぐに……呼びか:
Father...as soon as I figure out how to wake
him up...I will call on you... We will meet
again...

323288.「聖湖ゼニートの南にある 空き家なら\n 自由に使っていいって 言ってたわ。\n:
He said any vacant house south of Sacred Lake
Zenito is free to use. <cs_pchero>. Let's
go back to the town.

323289.「<cs_pchero>隊長～っ！\n ネーしゃまが こんなに 言ってるんだよ。:
Captain <cs_pchero>~! Nay-sama is talking
like this. I have no choice but to cooperate
with you!

323290.「私からも お願い <cs_pchero>！\n 創失の呪いを解く方法を 見つけ:
I also ask <cs_pchero>! Let's awaken God
Gran Zenith to find a way to break the curse
of unmaking!<yesno><close>

323291.「その答えを 待ってました！\n アストルティアと ゼニアスのために\n ネーし:
I've been waiting for your answer! Let's work
together for Astoltia and Zeniath!
